item.title: All David Stern Thought You Need to Know, Really
item.description: I came across an article on Twitter the other day about things to remember if you wanted to be a good physicist. I think Preskill tweeted the picture below in response. Physics Today, May 1993. I always enjoy this kind of `fragmented advice’ from older people. It is as if you were to stop them in the middle of the street and asked what piece of advice would they give to youngsters, multiple times.
